meta.name: description
meta.content: Lubbock-Cooper ISD is a public school serving pk-12th grade students in Lubbock County, Texas.

div.title: Search

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2700px; height: 1244px;

div.aside: ...building the future one student at a time!

article.div: The LCISD Child Nutrition Department is offering child meals via curbside pick-up at LCISD campuses. Food will be provided for all children under the age of 18, Monday-Saturday. Click the headline to learn more.

img.alt: Statement Regarding COVID-19 (School Closed through the end of the 2019-20 School Year) Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Statement Regarding COVID-19 (School Closed through the end of the 2019-20 School Year)

article.div: Governor Abbott has extended the closure of Texas schools through the end of the 2019-20 school year in order to prevent further spread of the COVID-19 virus. Please click the headline for more information specific to LCISD.

img.alt: Ahoy, little Pirates! Kindergarten registration time is here! Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Ahoy, little Pirates! Kindergarten registration time is here!

article.div: Because our campuses are currently closed, we are asking parents of next year's LCISD kindergarten students to complete an online pre-enrollment form. This pre-enrollment form will provide us with necessary student information along with guardian contact information. We will reach out within the next few weeks and let parents know how to submit any required documentation. Click the headline to complete a pre-enrollment form!

img.alt: YEE-HAW, little Pirates! Pre-k Roundup is RESCHEDULED Thumbnail Image

h1.a: YEE-HAW, little Pirates! Pre-k Roundup is RESCHEDULED

article.div: Our Pre-k Roundup event originally scheduled for April has been postponed due to the COVID-19 public health crisis. We now plan to host Pre-k Roundup on June 23 and June 24 (dates subject to change pending COVID-19 public health crisis). Remember, children must be at least four years of age by September 1, 2020, and must qualify for LCISD pre-k based on eligibility criteria. Click the headline for more information and to complete a pre-enrollment form!

img.alt: Brooke Garth wins LCU Excellence in Teaching Award Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Brooke Garth wins LCU Excellence in Teaching Award

article.div: Congratulations to Brooke Garth, who has been awarded the 2019-20 Lubbock Christian University Award for Excellence in Teaching! Mrs. Garth, who teaches 6th-8th social studies at LBMS, is known for her ability to connect with and engage her students, encourage their creativity and collaboration, and incorporate the learning methods that speak to and challenge them. We are so proud of this EXCELLENT Pirate educator!
Please make plans to attend the 5th Annual Lubbock-Cooper Golf Tournament Thursday, June 4. Click the headline for more information.

img.alt: Mobile Ordering Available at LCHS Cafeteria Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Mobile Ordering Available at LCHS Cafeteria

article.div: The LCHS Cafeteria will offer a MOBILE ORDERING service beginning Tuesday, February 4! Students will need to download the Nutrislice app, create a login, then order "build your own" burritos/burrito bowls, chili cheese fries, or "build your own" sandwiches! Food will be ready for pick-up at lunchtime at the left section of the Snack Bar, and students will pay at pick-up. Orders can be placed up to two days early, but must be in by 9:00 a.m. on the day the order will be picked up. (Please note, the meals offered through mobile ordering qualify for free/reduced-price costs and are open to all students.) For more information, click the headline!

img.alt: LCP Flags Now Available Thumbnail Image

article.div: Show off your LCP PRIDE with an LCP flag! Flag is 3x5, premium heavy-duty polyester and includes reinforced headband and grommets for indoor or outdoor display. Cost is $30! (Flags are available NOW at LCISD Administrative Offices - 13807 Indiana Avenue. Stop by to purchase or email kheinrich@lcisd.net to hold flags [one week hold maximum]!)

article.div: Download our newly launched Lubbock-Cooper Athletics app from the App Store or Google Play now! Click the headline for more information!
